rows.label: tev000594_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey, [ST:playername ]! How's it going?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000594_MSG0002
rows.name:
I was just petting that dog of yours.
What an adorable little pup![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000594_MSG0003
rows.name: It really brightened my day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000594_MSG0004
rows.name:
I know it's a different breed, but it reminds me of this
Yorkshire Terrier that lived in my neighborhood back
on Earth. I was so jealous of that little guy...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000594_JNK0010
rows.name: His Food?

rows.label: tev000594_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask if Gwin was jealous of the dog's food.

rows.label: tev000594_JNK0020
rows.name: His Owner?

rows.label: tev000594_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Gwin if the dog had a beautiful owner he desired.

rows.label: tev000594_MSG0005
rows.name:
That dog DID eat like a king—family that owned him
was absurdly wealthy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000594_MSG0006
rows.name:
It's a safe bet that dog was eating better food than
I do now. Probably had steaks for breakfast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000594_MSG0007
rows.name: But no, that wasn't what I was jealous of.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000594_MSG0008
rows.name:
Ha! Yeah, the wife of the family that owned the dog
was actually a total knockout.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000594_MSG0009
rows.name:
They were really wealthy, but nice, too—they never
rubbed it in anyone's face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000594_MSG0010
rows.name: But no, that wasn't what I was jealous of.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000594_MSG0011
rows.name:
I was jealous of the way they treated that dog like a
member of the family. It's better than the way a lot of
actual people are treated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000594_MSG0012
rows.name:
The whole family took it for walks every day,
they ate together, they watched TV together...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000594_MSG0020
rows.name: They were pretty much inseparable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000594_MSG0013
rows.name:
Meanwhile, both my parents were so busy that I barely
saw them at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000594_MSG0014
rows.name: I spent most of my days alone, or maybe with friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000594_MSG0015
rows.name:
But now I have a little more perspective.
Compared to Irina, I came from a happy family.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000594_MSG0016
rows.name:
I mean, I liked my parents, you know?
That's why I wanted to spend more time with them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000594_MSG0017
rows.name:
When I grew older and got a dog of my own,
I felt a lot less lonely all the time, but... Anyway, yeah.
Sorry. Didn't mean to get all mopey on you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000594_MSG0018
rows.name: I just wanted to say that you have a really cute dog.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000594_MSG0019
rows.name:
Man, wouldn't it be great if all the indigens here on
Mira were cute dogs instead of big slobbery monsters?
...Now I'll never get that image out of my head.[ST:wait ]
